attributes.title: Rip big toe 👊😔
attributes.review: where do i start. this app took hours to download and it wasn’t even that interesting. when it did download i was looking through the app when my 47 year old son rode over my big toe with his tricycle. this app distracted me and now i have to get a colonoscopy because trump ruined my toe. if i could give this 0 stars i would. as a 10 year old myself, i will not vote for him. trash. gen z is better. ❤️

attributes.title: 0 out of 10 would not recommend
attributes.review: I would give zero stars if I could, it took forever to download, and glitches as well. Waste of time. I downloaded the app to find out more about his policies and found out that he is really just a racist, homophobic white supremacist who has the intelligence of a Cheeto. Not to mention that he is most likely a rapist. If you want America to be great, then do not vote for him again! #dumptrump

attributes.title: Fake
attributes.review: I downloaded to see if I could find any reason to actually back what his voters say about him! and now i see why they back him so much! if you only listen to a liar, dictator, fascist, racist for your daily news and don’t fact check anything or do your own unbiased research-then ig all you will believe is the lies. Nonetheless-this app is filled with nothing but fake news, biased opinions and absolutely not factual information!!!

attributes.title: it’s a no for me💅
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support the amazing Donald trump🟠, but unfortunately when I downloaded the app, I started hearing little whispers “vote for trump” “vote for trump”😳👎it’s been following me around for days so I contacted the ghost adventures people and they wouldn’t even come inside Bc they were too scared🙀I finally deleted the app and the whispers went away🥳 so I don’t recommend this app at all or strange events will happen to you😔🤧

attributes.title: unacceptable
attributes.review: I can’t believe Apple still even has this app on the App Store. This app works terribly. As soon as it was downloaded, all of my other apps started glitching. TERRIBLE. If I could leave a 0 star rating, I would. I wanted to support our president but not if I have to go through this just to do it. As soon as I deleted the app, my apps started working again. I think it’s a government hacking system. NEVER again.

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: this app is absolutely horrible. It took DAYS to download even though i have good wifi. After it finally downloaded it was glitchy and barely worked and it kept showing me a picture of a cheeto i’m so confused. I would not recommend downloading this app it even try’s to get you to vote for the cheeto for president this app is a joke and does not bring any good for anyone who is not a white cis gendered straight male!!!

attributes.title: Cause of near-death experience
attributes.review:
I definitely do not recommend this to people who want to live a long and healthy life.
My grandmother was over visiting when she saw this orange face from this app on my device. She got a heart attack and we had her rushed to the hospital. After a few mental and medical tasks, the doctors declared that she had Cacophobia. The photo traumatized her and she still lays in the hospital bed unmoving, relying on the life support machine that stands nearby.
